body: Bro this shit fire bro i give it a 100/10

This and others like it has convinced me (and likely others) that Charlotte has broken the illusion that the "tsundere female childhood friend" is destined to hook up with the male character by the end of the story ... Sorry, Houki, but due to your (speaking politely) rather overly violent tendencies, I don't see that happening anymore. Of course, the final canon relationship outcome is up to the novel writer,and I won't complain about that, whenever it shows up.
I’ve only seen the first season but I found Charlotte to be the only likable girl, and probably the only one worth dating. The rest were annoying hostile and flat.
Ootsuka Kotora & Decensored - Two of my favorite tags.  Nice to see this get some love after all these years.
